template.description: Using Json content, grab values, add new values, send specific values back to flow file, and finally send to InvokeHttp
template.name: InvokeHttp Demo 2

labels.label: INSPECT QUEUE attributes ensure that each step is correct before proceeding
Notice use of Output Port for Errors Leave these routed during testing and then auto terminate later, or route the output port to an Error Notification Handler.

Notice schedule here set to 15 secs. This allows start, stop on Generate Flow to switch flow on. Do not leave this processor On. Only toggle to generate a single flow file, and test it through flow. When testing complete, evaluate required timing to start and run flow for production.
Notice use of Output Port for all relationships from InvokeHTTP. All are routed during initial testing before auto termination

outputPorts.name: ERRORS
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'ERRORS'' is invalid because Output connection for port 'ERRORS' is not defined.

outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'Response'' is invalid because Output connection for port 'Response' is not defined.
